name: Mayhem (itch)
description:
Never ending pure retro style arcade shoot-em-up

  • Wave after wave of alien blasting.
  • Destroy the powerdomes to progress.
  • Turret defences constantly trying to destroy you.
  • Take your time and hunter ships come for you.
  • Collect power ups to increase your firepower.

Plays on both mobiles and desktop browsers.

4 unique landscapes. Then it starts again, with more to blast.
